name: Blogging platform
description: A blogging website where users can sign up with a username and password, create posts with a title, content, image, and tags. The homepage has a search bar for blog titles and content, and a tag list to filter blogs

name: aaronhong.net
description: A portfolio website with Home, About, Projects, and Contact sections. It supports English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese languages and has both dark and light themes
